languages.text: "Замечание представителя убогого ксеновида, предпочитающего тактику беспорядочных атак куда попало и резни собственных союзников, не занесена в каталог ввиду низкой значимости".

"The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."
languages.original_text: "Замечание представителя убогого ксеновида, предпочитающего тактику беспорядочных атак куда попало и резни собственных союзников, не занесена в каталог ввиду низкой значимости".

traits.locale_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这只异形的观测数据并没有记录在案，因为这只堕落的异形偏好对随机地点进行无差别的攻击，屠杀自己的盟友。数据排除原因：低价值数据。”
languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

traits.locale_text: “这只异形的观测数据并没有记录在案，因为这只堕落的异形偏好对随机地点进行无差别的攻击，屠杀自己的盟友。数据排除原因：低价值数据。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'observation d'un représentant de l'abominable xénoforme, dont les méthodes habituelles incluent sans s'y limiter l'attaque de lieux aléatoires et le massacre de ses propres alliés, n'a pas été consignée. Raison : données sans valeur. »
languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

traits.locale_text: « L'observation d'un représentant de l'abominable xénoforme, dont les méthodes habituelles incluent sans s'y limiter l'attaque de lieux aléatoires et le massacre de ses propres alliés, n'a pas été consignée. Raison : données sans valeur. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Las observaciones del representante de una xenoforma degenerada cuyo enfoque predilecto consiste en una serie de ataques indiscriminados contra objetivos aleatorios seguido de la masacre de los propios aliados no ha sido catalogada. Motivo: valor insuficiente».
languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

traits.locale_text: «Las observaciones del representante de una xenoforma degenerada cuyo enfoque predilecto consiste en una serie de ataques indiscriminados contra objetivos aleatorios seguido de la masacre de los propios aliados no ha sido catalogada. Motivo: valor insuficiente».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の劣化形態の一例を観察すると、ランダムな場所での無差別攻撃を手段として好む特徴がある。自分の仲間を虐殺するとは目録に記載されていない。理由：データの価値が低いため」
languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の劣化形態の一例を観察すると、ランダムな場所での無差別攻撃を手段として好む特徴がある。自分の仲間を虐殺するとは目録に記載されていない。理由：データの価値が低いため」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Beobachtung eines Vertreters einer minderwertigen Xenoform, deren bevorzugte Strategie aus willkürlichen Angriffen auf zufällige Ziele und das Abschlachten eigener Verbündeter besteht, wurde nicht katalogisiert. Grund: minderwertige Daten."
languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

languages.text: "Tercih ettiği yaklaşım, rastgele konumlarda gelişigüzel saldırılar yapıp kendi müttefiklerini katletmek olan, alçak bir zenoform temsilcisinin incelemeleri kataloglanamadı. Sebebi: Değeri düşük veri."
languages.original_text: "The observation of a representative of a debased xenoform whose preferred approach features indiscriminate attacks on random locations and the slaughtering of his own allies has not been catalogued. Reason: low-value data."

traits.locale_text: "Tercih ettiği yaklaşım rastgele konumlarda gelişigüzel saldırılar yapmak ve kendi müttefiklerini katletmek olan, alçak bir zenoform temsilcisinin incelemeleri sınıflandırılamadı. Neden: Düşük değere sahip veri."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
